name: noip
description:
this is an rpg about a hopeful future & community & a low-tech web & permacomputing.

it's for any number of players, including one. you can play it synchronously, like most rpgs, or asynchronously. but i imagine it's nice to start synchronously.

it will be released by may 2022, at which point it will be pay-what-you-want and substantially cheaper. but if you want the pre-release version, it's $127,001. unfortunately, the maximum price on itch is $9999.99, so if you buy it you can try and pay that amount or you'll have to send me the rest some other way. sorry.
